bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: John Forsyth was a statesman, and governor of Georgia from Augusta (Richmond Co.), Ga.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection includes correspondence relating to Forsyth's service as governor of Georgia, minister to Spain, and Secretary of State. Also includes papers regarding a lawsuit of Caldcleugh, Boyd and Reid vs. John Forsyth, and letter from James Petigru.
